Name: imos VR LOFT
About the game: Virtual Reality for imos AG means not only technology, but also a modern visualization tool for sketching planning results, created with imos software. How imos technology can be integrated into the sales process as playfully, but nevertheless sales-promoting, it can also be integrated into the sales process, imos AG shows for the first time in the so-called 'VR LOFT'. The visitors are invited to take a look at the virtual experience and to marvel at the new possibilities.
